11132.content:
As much as she'd have loved to see Lord Voldemort and his Death Eaters squashed for their horrid crimes against both wizards and Muggles the now 100 foot Hermione Granger made her way instead silently across the now tiny countryside using a special spell she whipped up to keep from anyone magic or otherwise from discovering her presence not that she would be hard to spot anyway! She decided to have a little fun in the nonmagical world before beginning her quest of defeating the Dark Lord herself doing Harry Potter a favor.

Although it only took a few days for Hermione now a hundred times the size of even someone like Hagrid it seemed to be a matter of minutes and soon she found herself towering over the familiar heart of downtown London she had of course been here dozens of times before with her parents so she was as much as familiar with every inch of it as Hogwarts and speaking of which the moment the 100 witch stepped foot behind a building several tiny Muggles took one look and screamed

"What's that a giant monster!!" One screamed

"No it's a alien from Mars coming to invade our world!!" Another screamed running for his life Hermione snorted rolling her eyes

"A alien really? Muggles and their strange science fiction!" But decided to play along anyway

"Roooaaaarr!" She pretended to make a realistic monstrous roar like those she had seen on those old Muggle Japanese films that one time in her childhood "Yes indeed I am a giant space creature from Mars but don't worry I'm not here to hurt you I only.......oh......." As she felt her stomach growling it had been a lifetime ago since she had something to eat and boy was she starving! Luckily she had eaten out at some of the fanciest restaurants here in London with her parents several times during the holidays.

As the tiny Londoners continued running for their lives as they heard the giant alien's stomach growl and panicked even more as they witnessed the young witch reach down and pick up a small restaurant that was fortunately empty and dropped the entire thing into her mouth

"Mmmmm good!" Hermione thought then another followed soon after and another soon enough there wasn't hardly that contained food left standing Hermione amazingly had cleaned it all out and now she sat at a abandoned site her face flushed with embarrassment

"Oh no looks like I went a little too overboard on the eating part! I just hope there's still some food left for all these...." But she paused when she felt a odd feeling in her stomach again

"Uh oh........I have to......Buuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrpppppppppppp!" As she tried holding it in but it came out like a tidal wave which caused the ground to shake violently and people who hadn't run away fought to keep their balance as car alarms went off in the distance and a few window skyscrapers exploded finally it ended as soon as it begun and the giant witch simply sat there wide eyed and with a hand over her mouth in sheer embarrassment

"Oh excuse me!!" She cried out surveying the damage her burp-quake caused "I'm terribly,really sorry!" What happens now?

Harry opened his eyes to find a giant Hermione staring down at him, not only her in fact but the whole room appeared much larger, much bigger for now it appeared that even Hermione's knees were above him. [b]"W-what did you do it me, Hermione?"[/b] he asked her.

"Isn't it obvious, Harry?" she responded I shrunk you. I'd say are no more than a foot tall. She picked up a ruler from a nearby tape measure from out of his bag and measured him. [b]"Exactly one foot"[/b] she declared triumphantly [b]"I could have so much fun with you now."[/b]

"No you're not, I'm going to kick your butt for this, Hermione!" he shouted up at her.

"Oh Harry, you can't kick that high"[/b] she laughed back at him "know this though, I was thinking of only keeping you tiny for a little while, but now you have threatened me, perhaps I should leave you this way.... forever."

"Forever?" he gasped.

"Yes, forever Harry, you will stay as you are now and I know exactly what to do with you now."

She reached down and picked him up, at his new size he was no heavier than a small child's doll.

12111.content:
"You were talking about getting close to my butt Harry"[/b] Hermione remarked as she started carrying him towards a nearby armchair [b]"I can help you there."

"What are you talking about, Hermione?"

"I'm going to sit on you, I have thought about sitting on you on any number of occasions; the first being on the train when we first met. If Ron wasn't there with you, I probably would have but now you have given me the perfect excuse."

"You'll crush me, Hermione."

"Are you trying to tell me that I am fat?" Her voice suddenly took on a more threatening tone.

"No, of course not but at my size...."

"Oh you aren't small enough to suffer any permanent damage, at least I don't think you are."

"Please don't, I'm sorry. I shouldn't have threatened you."

"It's too late."

Hermione had reached the chair. She removed his shoes and laid Harry's shrunken form down upon the seat, on his back with his head at one end and his feet at the other.

Harry reached for his pocket, hoping to find his wand but his pocket was empty. "My wand" he gasped "I left it in my bag."

Hermione smiled, he didn't have his wand with him, he was utterly defenceless. [b]"Well then it will stay there" she informed him "you won't be able to wave it at your size anyway, I can wave mine though."

She took out her wand, and pointing it at Harry she cast a full body bind spell. Harry's body suddenly went stiff and still. "Just to keep you in place whilst I sit down" she remarked, then she turned around, presenting her back to the chair.

Harry could see Hermione's back, but he couldn't move, he couldn't do anything but wait. Her butt cheeks loomed above him, covered by her skirt and the back of her robes, and he was sure that any moment those same butt cheeks would descend upon him, he had no reason to doubt what she was telling him. He started to wonder how it would feel to be sat upon by her, would it hurt? Would he break? Would he be safe but buried umder an immense pressure? Might he even enjoy it? She had told him she can considered sitting on him when he was his usual size, that might not have been so bad, would it be any worse for him now? He wasn't sure whether to be afraid or curious for what was to come, he started to feel a curious sense of ambivalence. He would know better when it happeened, he didn't have to wait long though.

Hermione's knees bent at that point and she started to descend towards the seat beneath her, the one upon which the frozen, shrunken Harry was now resting. She had shrunk him, she had frozen him and now she was going to sit on him. The way she was acting though, it as as though Harry was not in fact occupying the seat, but that she had rather found an empty chair to sit upon; that chair was hers and to all intents and purposes Harry's presence upon it wasn't even a consideration. She sat as she had sat on that armchair countless times before.

It only took a matter of moments before Hermione was sitting in that seat, sitting upon Harry. She even smiled as she felt her feminine backside make contact with the tiny boy who was occupying her seat. She allowed her full weight to press down firmly upon him, lifting her own feet off the floor as she sat. As Harry was around a foot long though, his head and his feet were uncovered whist the rest of his body was clearly beneath her. She grinned as she saw his face emerging from under her skirt on her right side; his stiff, frozen face.

She didn't want to keep him frozen though, now that he was in place, he wasn't going anywhere. With a wave of her wand she lifted the body bind spell.

"You really are the perfect seat cushion, Harry" she smiled down at him.

12521.content:
Hermione was usually a very well-behaved girl, but discovering she was a Resizer- a wizard with an innate power to change the size of objects and people- had awakened her latent rebellious tendencies. Voldemort was dead, she was in her last year at Hogwarts, and after having to live like a fugitive for ten months, she had recognized the occasional necessity of breaking rules. Add that to the rather awkward reunion she'd had with her parents after restoring their memories, and you had a girl who looked forward to using her power for personal gratification. Although they had claimed to understand why she had modified their entire life memories for over a year, Hermione's parents had been standoffish with her ever since, and she suspected that they were still coming to terms with how much control a powerful witch could exert over Muggles without fearing any consequences. Between the trauma of the war, her deteriorated relationship with her parents, and the pressure of preparing for NEWTS, Hermione was eager to take her frustrations out on somebody who deserved it. She had the perfect target in mind: Pansy Parkinson, the alpha bitch from Slytherin who had bullied Hermione in much the same way that Draco had bullied Harry and Ron. Hermione had been practicing with her new powers whenever she had
a chance for months, and she was reasonably sure that she could shrink Pansy down to six inches and keep her that way long enough to work out some pent up frustration. They best part was that Pansy wouldn't remember anything that Hermione did to her, as Hermione was quite good at memory charms.
(Although the books describe Pansy as ugly, I picked her because of her portrayal by Scarlett Byrne. Follow link below)

Subsequently, when Hermione announced that she would be enacting her revenge for all of the emotional abuse that Pansy had inflicted on her, Pansy's only response was to Hermione to go fuck herself. For a moment, Hermione let her anger show on her lovely face, but then she schooled her flawless, movie-star quality features into an innocent grin. "Why Pansy, you are not only going do what I wish, you going to do so gleefully!" she declared. "Fuck you whore! why don't you go-" whatever crass suggestion Pansy was thinking of would never be known, as Hermione picked that moment to point her wand at Pansy and declare "Imperio!" Such was Hermione's skill that she did not need to speak commands to Pansy. Instead, she merely had to imagine her revenge on the girl whom she had despised for seven years, and Pansy made her new mistress's wishes a reality. Furthermore, Hermione was so dexterous with magic that she was able to leave Pansy aware of what she was doing while being controlled, rather than leaving her with the empty-minded bliss that most victims of the Imperious Curse experienced.
